Class JavaSoundAudioBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.xtec.jclic.media.AudioBuffer
      • edu.xtec.jclic.media.JavaSoundAudioBuffer

  • public class JavaSoundAudioBuffer
extends AudioBuffer
    This class extends AudioBuffer using the javax.sound.sampled package.
    Version:
    13.09.10
    Author:
    Francesc Busquets (fbusquets@xtec.cat)
